T02D2318:262a-1: ratna pra d'i pa n'a ma /
T02D2318:262a-3: rin po che sgron ma zhes bya ba /
T02D2318:262a-4: 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2318:262a-5: ma rig mun pa sel mdzad pa //
T02D2318:262a-6: dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud //
T02D2318:262a-7: dang po zin par bya ba dang //
T02D2318:262a-8: bar du brtan par bya ba gces//
T02D2318:262a-9: tham bogs kyis dbyung thabs so //
T02D2318:262a-10: mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob dang //
T02D2318:262a-11: ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2318:262a-12: rtags dang nyams myong yon tan dang //
T02D2318:262a-13: tshad dang skyon dang bcos thabs so //
T02D2318:262a-14: ma zin zin par byed pa la //
T02D2318:262a-15: lus kyi gnad dang dmigs pa'i gnad //
T02D2318:262b-0: rlung gi @262b gnad ni shes par bya //
T02D2318:262b-1: zin pa brtan par byed 'dod na //
T02D2318:262b-2: rtsal sbyong gsum la mkhas par bya //
T02D2318:262b-3: brtan pa gong du bogs 'byin na //
T02D2318:262b-4: bogs 'byin gsum la goms par bya //
T02D2318:262b-5: mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob la //
T02D2318:262b-6: ngo sprod bzhi bzhir shes bar bya //
T02D2318:262b-7: dang po mnyam gzhag ngo sprod ni //
T02D2318:262b-8: rig pa mtha' rkyang dar dang chas //
T02D2318:262b-9: nam mkha' lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon //
T02D2318:262b-10: rig pa thang sha gcad pa ni //
T02D2318:262b-11: gzhu bzangs bdungs pa'i dpe yis mtshon //
T02D2318:262b-12: de nas rig pa rtsal sbyang ni //
T02D2318:262b-13: dar chen rlung gis bskyod pas mtshon //
T02D2318:262b-14: rig pa rjen par gzhag pa ni //
T02D2318:262b-15: gnyug ma lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon //
T02D2318:262b-16: rjes thob la yang ngo sprod bzhi //
T02D2318:262b-17: mnyam gzhag rjes thob med par sprad //
T02D2318:262b-18: rkyen pa drag zhan med par sprod //
T02D2318:262b-19: dbang po thogs rdugs med par sprad //
T02D2318:262b-20: rang bzhin gsal ba dri med yin //
T02D2318:262b-21: mtshan nyid nyams su myong ba'o //
T02D2318:262b-22: rtags la rnam pa bzhir gsungs te //
T02D2318:262b-23: btang na 'gro la bzhag na sdod //
T02D2318:262b-24: dgos pa'i dus su snyeg pa dang //
T02D2318:262b-25: shes bzhin gnad du tshud pa'i //
T02D2318:262b-26: nyams myong la yang de bzhin te //
T02D2318:262b-27: bde ba dang ni gsal ba dang //
T02D2318:262b-28: mi rtog pa dang mi g-yo ba'o //
T02D2318:262b-29: yon tan mngon par shes pa 'char //
T02D2318:262b-30: tshad ni rtsa ba brtan pa dang //
T02D2318:262b-31: de bzhin rtse mo rno ba nyid //
T02D2318:262b-32: bar ni gsal ba ngar dang chas //
T02D2318:262b-33: dmigs pa sna tshogs sgyur shes pa'o //
T02D2318:262b-34: skyon ni bying dang rmugs pa dang //
T02D2318:262b-35: de bzhin rgod dang g-yeng ba'o //
T02D2318:262b-36: bcos pa la yang rnam gsum ste //
T02D2318:262b-37: rin chen gser ltar bcos pa dang //
T02D2318:262b-38: 'tsho mdzad sman pa lta bu dang //
T02D2318:262b-39: bi shva karma'i bzo bzhin no //
